plugins.name: Type Rhythm
plugins.description:
A simple plugin for efficiently adjusting typography in Figma. You can increase or decrease font size in 8px increments, and adjust line height in 10% increments. It also allows you to convert Auto line height to 150%. Using tools like Keyboard Maestro to set up shortcuts can enhance your workflow.

plugins.name: Crosshatch Image Effect Generator
plugins.description:
Create beautiful crosshatch artwork from any photograph with our powerful image transformation tool.


Key Features:

  1. Real-time preview - See changes instantly as you adjust settings
  2. Settings controls - Fine-tune density, line thickness, contrast, and layering
  3. Multiple presets - Choose from curated image collections or upload your own


Perfect for graphic designers creating vintage-style artwork, artists exploring digital techniques, social media content creators, and anyone who wants to transform ordinary photos into extraordinary hand-drawn illustrations.


Use Case Examples

  1. Convert portraits into classic sketch-style artwork
  2. Create vintage-style illustrations for branding
  3. Transform landscapes into artistic prints
  4. Generate unique social media content
  5. Design book illustrations and editorial art

plugins.name: Freaking Fake Data
plugins.description:
About plugin:

Freaking Fake Data simplifies your design workflow in Figma, FigJam and Slides by letting you fill mockups with custom, project-specific data instead of random content. Take control of your text layers, create tailored datasets and unify data formats for your design team ‚Äî perfect for consistent names, phone numbers or other details. Working locally, it boosts productivity and eliminates errors while speeding up mockup creation.


Key Features:

  1. Effortless Mockup Filling: Quickly populate text layers with your data.
  2. Unified Team Data: Import a CSV or JSON file for team consistency.
  3. Bulk Text Magic: Mass-apply text to layers with one click.
  4. Cross-Platform Support: Works in Figma, FigJam and Slides.
  5. Easy Data Import: Upload CSV or JSON files instantly.
  6. Default Data Option: Test with preloaded samples (e.g., names, cities).


How to Use:

  1. Import Data: Create a table in a tool like Google Sheets or Excel, fill it with data, export as CSV or JSON, and upload‚Äîor use default data. Import multiple files and switch via tabs.
  2. Select Text Layers: Highlight the text layers to apply data to.
  3. Apply Data: Pick a column (e.g., "First Name") and apply data. Choose order:
  4. Sort: Inserts data in table order.
  5. Random: Inserts data in random order.
  6. Explore Options: Switch tabs, view rows, or use "Set as Default" to save a tab for next launch.


How to Create a Table:

  1. Enter data in columns (e.g., "First Name" in one, "City" in another); the first row becomes button names.
  2. Add separators by leaving a column empty with "---" or "- - -" in the header for a line or use "//Special Offers" or "// Special Offers" for a labeled group divider. (example: telegram)


Perfect for prototypes, presentations or team projects ‚Äî try it now!
plugins.tagline: Fill Mockups Quickly ‚Äî use unified data for your design team. Massively paste your text into Figma

plugins.description:

‚ú® Key Features


üé® Variables Management

‚Ä¢Import from JSON ‚Äì Bring your design tokens into Figma with just a few clicks

‚Ä¢Light & Dark Mode Support ‚Äì Import variables for multiple modes effortlessly

‚Ä¢Smart Conflict Handling ‚Äì Choose to overwrite, skip, or rename existing variables

‚Ä¢Organize with Collections ‚Äì Group and manage your variables into clean collections


üìù Text Styles

‚Ä¢Create Custom Styles ‚Äì Define fonts, sizes, weights, and line heights that match your system

‚Ä¢Apply in One Click ‚Äì Select a text layer and apply styles instantly

‚Ä¢Live Preview ‚Äì See exactly how your styles will look before creating

‚Ä¢Full Style Control ‚Äì View, apply, or delete styles from a single interface


üìÑ Page Management

‚Ä¢Quick Page Creation ‚Äì Add new pages without the manual setup

‚Ä¢Batch Mode ‚Äì Create multiple pages at once by listing names line-by-line

‚Ä¢Organize with Ease ‚Äì Rename, reorder, and delete pages from one place


üöÄ Starter Templates

‚Ä¢Working File Structure ‚Äì Automatically generate pages like Cover, Research, Drafts, and Final Designs

‚Ä¢Design System Setup ‚Äì Instantly build a system with pages for Typography, Colors, Components, Layouts, Templates, and Docs

plugins.name: Zuuvi Export Service
plugins.description:
Zuuvi Export Service is a Figma plugin designed to integrate Figma with Zuuvi‚Äôs Studio platform, making it easier and more efficient for designers who work with both tools. The plugin helps reduce the need to manually recreate designs in Studio after first mocking them up in Figma. While built around Figma‚Äôs capabilities, the exported result aims to reflect the original design as closely as possible within the constraints of Studio‚Äôs features.


Easily export ad creatives from Figma directly into your Zuuvi workspace - ready for production, personalisation, and cross-channel publishing.

Whether you're designing HTML5 banners, social media ads, retail media formats or in-store screens, this plugin helps creative teams move faster and stay in control.


üîß What You Can Do with the Zuuvi Plugin:

  1. Export static or layered ad designs directly from Figma to Zuuvi
  2. Optimise for use across display, social, retail media, DOOH, video, and more
  3. Support for production-ready HTML5 ad creatives
  4. Maintain template structure and layer control for streamlined animation workflows


üöÄ Why Use Zuuvi for Your Ad Production?

Zuuvi is a Creative Performance Platform that empowers marketers and designers to:


  1. Build high-quality, high-performing HTML5 ads at speed
  2. Personalise and localise creatives across channels and markets
  3. Scale ad production without adding design overhead
  4. Centralise all ad formats - from social media creatives to dynamic banners - in one platform


üìö Documentation & Support

Full plugin guide and step-by-step tutorials: https://help.zuuvi.com/en/articles/10774913-how-to-export-from-figma-to-zuuvi-studio


Questions? Reach out anytime via our live chat or care@zuuvi.com


üß© Requirements

To use this plugin, an active Zuuvi account is required.

Not a user yet? Learn more and book a demo here.


üîí Data Security

We value your creative integrity and your data privacy. Zuuvi follows best practices for security, and all plugin exports are processed securely through your Zuuvi account.


Design in Figma. Scale in Zuuvi.

From idea to high-performing ad campaign ‚Äì Zuuvi makes creative production fast, scalable, and impactful.
plugins.tagline: Convert your Figma designs to omnichannel ad campaigns

  2. ÂõæÂÉèÂ∞ÜÊòæÁ§∫Âú®Âõ∫ÂÆöÂ§ßÂ∞èÁöÑÈ¢ÑËßàÊ°ÜÂÜÖÔºåÁº©ÊîæËÆæÁΩÆ‰ºöÊ†πÊçÆÊÇ®ÁöÑÂºÄÂÖ≥ÈÄâÊã©ËøõË°åÂ∫îÁî®„ÄÇ
  3. Êèí‰ª∂Êìç‰Ωú‰æùËµñ‰∫é Figma ÁîªÂ∏É‰∏äÁöÑÈÄâ‰∏≠ÂÖÉÁ¥†ÔºåËØ∑Á°Æ‰øùÂú®‰ΩøÁî®Êèí‰ª∂ÂâçÈÄâ‰∏≠Ê≠£Á°ÆÁöÑÂÖÉÁ¥†„ÄÇ


Introduction

Image Size Integration allows Figma users to efficiently manage and integrate images within frames, groups, and components. With this plugin, you can adjust image sizes and apply uniform dimensions for a consistent design output.


Function Description

  1. Allows users to select multiple elements (Frames, Groups, Components, Text, Instances, etc.) in a Figma design.
  2. Automatically calculates the maximum width and height from the selected elements.
  3. Displays each selected image inside a preview box, either maintaining its original size or resizing it based on the longest side, as determined by the user's settings.
  4. A toggle feature to switch between maintaining the image's original size or scaling it to fit the preview box.
  5. Supports flexible control over how images are displayed within their allocated preview space.


How to Use

  1. Select the elements (Frames, Groups, Text, Components, Instances, etc.) you want to preview and adjust.
  2. Click the "Generate Base64 Preview" button to create image previews.
  3. Use the toggle to switch between keeping the image‚Äôs original size or scaling it to fit the preview box.
  4. View the adjusted images and their corresponding dimensions directly within the plugin's interface.


Notes

  1. The plugin supports both raster images and vector elements.
  2. Images will be displayed in a fixed-size preview box, and resizing settings apply based on your toggle choice.
  3. The plugin works with selected elements in Figma's canvas, so ensure you have the right items selected before applying the tool.

plugins.name: Padding Check
plugins.description: Are developers always at your back since your paddings are always not multiples of 4? This plugin solves this problem of yours where you can quickly identify the Figma frames with the said padding issues. The plugin has a very simple UI where we have info display section and 2 buttons. 1st button "Highlight frames" selects all problematic frames and brings them to your view (Shift+1) and the 2nd button "Mark frames" creates a red box around all the frames that have a padding issue. The good news is that this plugin works only for Auto layout frames and not for all frames thereby not giving you unwanted results. As a helper once the plugin is executed (either of the buttons used to find the frames with issues) The information section of the plugin UI displays the count of the frames with issues helping the user to quickly take account of the issue.
plugins.tagline: Are all paddings in your Figma file multiples of 4? Use this plugin to quickly identify if not!

plugins.name: OS converter
plugins.description:
Stop duplicating your work! Convert entire flows or single frames between iOS and Android in seconds ‚Äî no more tedious manual adjustments.


Why OS Converter?

Designers are often faced with a choice:

  1. Design in one OS and leave conversions to developers
  2. Manually recreate each flow for both platforms


With OS Converter, you get the best of both worlds ‚Äî fast, accurate, and hassle-free conversion.


How it works:

  1. Set up your components ‚Äì Use a variant property named "OS" with values "iOS" and "Android"
  2. Run the plugin ‚Äì When your layouts are ready to convert
  3. Click to swap! ‚Äì Convert single frames or entire flows in one click
  4. üé® See it in action! Check out the sample file below.

plugins.name: Case Shifter
plugins.description:
Overview

Streamline your design workflow with the Frame Renamer plugin for Figma! This tool allows you to quickly and efficiently rename frame names, making it especially useful when organizing and exporting layers.


Features

  1. Quick Rename: Easily rename frames in bulk, saving time and effort.
  2. Organize Layers: Keep your Figma projects neat and well-organized by using consistent naming conventions.
  3. Efficient Exporting: Simplify your exporting process by standardizing layer names, reducing errors and improving efficiency.


Supported Naming Conventions

The Frame Renamer currently supports the following cases:

  1. camelCase: e.g., frameNameExample
  2. snake_case: e.g., frame_name_example
  3. kebab-case: e.g., frame-name-example
  4. PascalCase: e.g., FrameNameExample


Future Updates

We are continually working to improve the Frame Renamer plugin. Stay tuned for more features and naming conventions in future updates!
plugins.tagline: Transform your Layer name, one case at a time.

With AI, it suggests clear and consistent names that follow design and design system best practices.

  4. Simple interface: One-click use, no complicated setup. Advanced options are available if you need them.
  5. Design token support: Perfect for solo or teams using advanced design systems.
  6. Custom API support: Use your own API key (OpenAI, DeepSeek, Perplexity, or OpenRouter) for more control.


üí° Why choose Magic Renamer AI?

Unlike other plugins, Magic Renamer AI uses artificial intelligence to understand the context of each layer and suggest names tailored to your project. It ensures consistency, reduces errors, and fits seamlessly into your Figma workflow. It‚Äôs the perfect tool to save time, improve file quality, and speed up your design process.

133085.name: UXDocx - Styles and Variables Table Component Generator
133085.description:
Generate ready to use table components containing your local variables and styles including their type, collection and values. The component is generated with pre-made variants for types (effects, paints, text, numbers, strings etc.).


Easy to use:

Open the file containing the desired variables and styles

Click on of the 2 Generate buttons. One for variables and the other for styles.

That's it


Bonus: These components can be used in Figma Sites too in cases you want your documentation there
